definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The original inquiry from abroad, information, and my heart is relatively happy.
sentences.chinese: 原來是來自國外詢盤信息，心裏也比較高興。

sentences.english: 4，Enquiries are so large that we can only than allot you 200 cases.
sentences.chinese: 詢盤如此之多，我們只能分給你們200箱貨。

sentences.english: Your are urged to give an early reply to our enquiry for groundnuts.
sentences.chinese: 請早日答覆我們有關花生的詢盤。

sentences.english: We have received your letter of July 1, enquiring about the best terms of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司7月1日來函就該商品優惠條件的詢盤敬悉。

sentences.english: We have received an inquiry from our clients in Japan for your shoes and hats.
sentences.chinese: 有關貴方鞋帽，我已收到日本客戶的詢盤。

sentences.english: Heaudio-videoy enquiries witness the quality of our products.
sentences.chinese: 大量詢盤證明我們產品格量過硬。

sentences.english: We are looking forward to your reply to our inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 我們期待你方對我方的詢盤做出答覆。

sentences.english: Heavy enquires witness the quality of our products!
sentences.chinese: 大量的詢盤證明我們的產品質量過硬。

sentences.english: We are looking forward to your reply to our inquiry。
sentences.chinese: 我們期待你方對我方的詢盤做出答覆。

sentences.english: Enquiries are so large that we can only allot you 200 cases.
sentences.chinese: 詢盤如此之多，我們只能分給你們200箱貨。

sentences.english: A lot of inquiries confirm the high quality of our products.
sentences.chinese: 大量詢盤證明我們產品質量過硬。

sentences.english: They transferred their future inquiries to X Company.
sentences.chinese: 他們將以後的詢盤轉給X公司。

sentences.english: Please address your enquires to the manager.
sentences.chinese: 請將貴方的詢盤寄給經理。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, inquiries are formulfound oned by the buyers.
sentences.chinese: 詢盤一樣平常由買方發出。

sentences.english: You can rest assured that we shall revert to your enquiry as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 請放心，我方以後將盡速重新處理你的詢盤。
